## R Markdown

#### Load library and import data
```{r import, message = FALSE}
library(ZentUtils)

zent <- zentutils(system.file("extdata", "homer_reb1_badis_motif_scan.bed", package = "ZentUtils"), genome = "sacCer3")
```
  
  
We now have the regions of interest stored as a GRanges object in the "regions" slot of the ZentUtils object:

```{r showgrange}
zent@regions
```
